title: Singular Possession
content: This is [Tom's|Toms'] book. The [dog's|dogs'] bone is buried in the yard.
explanationEnUs: For singular nouns, add 's to show possession.
explanationZhTw: 對於單數名詞，加上 's 表示所有格。
explanationZhCn: 对于单数名词，加上 's 表示所有格。

title: Plural Possession (ending in s)
content: The [teachers'|teacher's] lounge is upstairs. My [parents'|parent's] house is big.
explanationEnUs: For plural nouns ending in s, just add an apostrophe after the s.
explanationZhTw: 對於以 s 結尾的複數名詞，只需在 s 後面加上撇號。
explanationZhCn: 对于以 s 结尾的复数名词，只需在 s 后面加上撇号。

title: Irregular Plural Possession
content: The [children's|childrens'] toys are everywhere. [Men's|Mens'] clothing is on the second floor.
explanationEnUs: For plural nouns not ending in s, add 's (e.g., children's, men's).
explanationZhTw: 對於不以 s 結尾的複數名詞，加上 's (例如 children's, men's)。
explanationZhCn: 对于不以 s 结尾的复数名词，加上 's (例如 children's, men's)。

title: Names Ending in S
content: This is [James's|James] car. Or you can say [James'|James] car.
explanationEnUs: For names ending in s, you can usually add 's or just the apostrophe (James's or James'). Both are acceptable.
explanationZhTw: 對於以 s 結尾的名字，通常可以加上 's 或只加撇號 (James's 或 James')。兩者都被接受。
explanationZhCn: 对于以 s 结尾的名字，通常可以加上 's or 只加撇号 (James's or James')。两者都被接受。

title: Joint Possession
content: This is [Bob and Mary's|Bob's and Mary's] house. They bought it together.
explanationEnUs: If two people own something together, add 's only to the second name.
explanationZhTw: 如果兩個人共同擁有某物，只在第二個名字後加 's。
explanationZhCn: 如果两个人共同拥有某物，只在第二个名字后加 's。
